inclusion.criterion: If pregnant before, ≥12 months since last pregnancy
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Known allergy to shellfish or iodine
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Blood pressure on the day of measurements is low or high (systolic blood pressure (SBP) <90 or ≥130 mmHg and/or diastolic blood pressure (DBP) <60 or ≥80 mmHg)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Currently has low or high blood pressure (SBP <90 or ≥130 mmHg and/or DBP <60 or ≥80 mmHg), self-reported
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Current hypertension or previous hypertensive disorder in pregnancy (gestational hypertension or preeclampsia)
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Taking regular medication(s) (physician's prescribed medications for a health condition)
exclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Currently using hormonal birth control or used within last 3 months
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient has Turner syndrome, is obese and mentally retarded. She is treating with GH since 6 months ago without estrogen therapy to avoid menarche and reach the ideal height.
